column1: Differentiate between supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms.
Explain common classification algorithms (e.g., Logistic Regression, Decision Trees, Random Forests).
Discuss how you would evaluate the performance of a classification model. (e.g., Accuracy, Precision, Recall, F1-Score)
Explain common regression algorithms (e.g., Linear Regression, Support Vector Regression).
Discuss the concept of overfitting and underfitting in machine learning models.
Describe different techniques for model selection and regularization (e.g., Cross-Validation, L1/L2 Regularization).
Briefly explain the concept of ensemble learning methods (e.g., Random Forests, Gradient Boosting).
Discuss the importance of feature engineering in machine learning projects.
How do you handle imbalanced class distributions in classification problems?
Explain the concept of dimensionality reduction and techniques like PCA.
